decision_conditions: Pursuant to The Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure) (amendment No 3) (England) Order 2009, the revisions as detailed in A107, A109, A1-01 and Schedule of changes  are considered not to be materially different from the approved plans and may therefore be implemented without the need for further planning permission.
description: Non material amendment to approved application DM2023/01487 which allowed the 'Erection of a single storey side extension, and alterations to garage and rear elevation fenestrations' to provide a door to side.
